title: (x) Pottery Barn Kids catalogue - VAG Rounded {Patricia}
content:
Someone sent me this sample to ID but I'm drawing a blank. Any ideas?

comments.content: Thanks! Funny, the shapes looked familiar but I didn't think of rounded fonts because that wasn't clear in the scan.
